6F7CEFF9BCCF4FB7AB5BCAD1DD66C120.description:
Lifelong Learning:
Learners set goals and reflect
on their progress in using
languages for enjoyment,
enrichment, and advancement.

5EE012C4E38441D5BFA60689854F9849.description: School and Global Communities: Learners use the language both within and beyond the classroom to interact and collaborate in their community and the globalized world.

644AF11D83404AEB8A4096A57DEC166C.description:
Cultural
Comparisons:
Learners use the language to
investigate, explain, and
reflect on the concept of
culture through comparisons
of the cultures studied and
their own.

9581C417598B4DE3823E46CDCAF1279A.description:
Language
Comparisons:
Learners use the language to
investigate, explain, and
reflect on the nature of
language through
comparisons of the language
studied and their own.

4E0352E5B10D493186AD9AE6E25ECD88.description:
Acquiring
Information and Diverse
Perspectives:
Learners access and evaluate
information and diverse
perspectives that are
available through the
language and its cultures.

494D89457F314C1DB7752AFB657E24EC.description:
Making
Connections: Learners build,
reinforce, and expand their
knowledge of other
disciplines while using the
language to develop critical
thinking and to solve
problems creatively.

F5B951869F3441A9B4E1D1D525314FE0.description:
Relating Cultural
Products to Perspectives:
Learners use the language to
investigate, explain, and
reflect on the relationship
between the products and
perspectives of the cultures
studied.

841A1059BAC4413CBA62C37E0F2BD0A3.description:
Relating Cultural
Practices to Perspectives:
Learners use the language to
investigate, explain, and
reflect on the relationship
between the practices and
perspectives of the cultures
studied.

D002FA55E0444F86A623CE44CB254DA6.description:
Presentational
Communication:
Learners present
information, concepts, and
ideas to inform, explain,
persuade, and narrate on a
variety of topics using
appropriate media and
adapting to various
audiences of listeners,
readers, or viewers.

1BAFF0E3C773405CAF6881EF60AAF8C2.description:
Interpretive
Communication:
Learners understand,
interpret, and analyze what
is heard, read, or viewed on
a variety of topics.

88166DFF60554A9697399A95E6FDD18E.description:
Interpersonal
Communication:
Learners interact and
negotiate meaning in
spoken, signed, or written
conversations to share
information, reactions,
feelings, and opinions.
